lead_paragraph: Lifelong Manchester United fan Danny Simpson says champions Leicester City will go for broke at Old Trafford on Saturday, underlining coach Claudio Ranieri's philosophy.

headline.print_headline: Soccer: Leicester's 'Deep-Down Red' Plots United's Fall
headline.main: Soccer: Leicester's 'Deep-Down Red' Plots United's Fall
